title: Les conflits du travail en Russie soviétique pendant le « communisme de guerre » et la N.E.P.

items.abstract: Patients expect safe accountable care from their healthcare providers. Quality is doing the right thing, in the right way, at the right time, for the right reason, and to the right person. A number of governmental and non-governmental organizations have emerged to set standards for quality and safety. Rapid response systems (RRSs) are an important part of safety structure and this chapter aims to provide a basic understanding of the patient safety and quality movement, medical error and adverse events, and the role of the rapid response team (RRT) in identifying and reporting threats to patient safety. It offers a brief introduction of just culture, disclosure, and second victim.
title: Patient Safety and Quality Improvement (DRAFT)
Evaluation of Rectus Sheath Hematoma (RSH)
